name: Split-Bloc
description:
Split-Bloc Split-Bloc is a short puzzle game made for the GDevelop Jam #3 Split the blocs into the size needed for the job as you venture through all 20 levels. Take your time to learn the level layout with the spectate button before deciding on your next move.

controls:

  • W, A, D - movement
  • Mouse - UI control
  • M (hold) - return to menu

All code, visuals, music and most sound effects were created by me. The two sound effects used (not made by me) are the "chime" from Windows95 and "TABC22.wav" from Full Tilt! Pinball.

aspect ratio is messed up on the liluo.io page.

liluo.io link: https://liluo.io/world1lev1/split-bloc
